title: Der Herr der Ringe: Die Gefährten
desc: An ancient Ring thought lost for centuries has been found, and through a strange twist of fate has been given to a small Hobbit named Frodo. When Gandalf discovers the Ring is in fact the One Ring of the Dark Lord Sauron, Frodo must make an epic quest to the Cracks of Doom in order to destroy it.

title: Nope
desc: Nope is a 2022 American neo-Western science fiction horror film directed, written, and co-produced by Jordan Peele under his Monkeypaw Productions banner. It stars Daniel Kaluuya and Keke Palmer as horse-wrangling siblings attempting to capture evidence of an unidentified flying object.

title: Get Out
desc: A young African-American photographer by the name of Chris Washington is dragged out to his girlfriend's parents' house to spend the weekend and meet the family. Chris feels unwelcome, considering there are only three other African-Americans on the farm, and two of them work on it.

title: Batman
desc: Plot. On Halloween, Gotham City mayor Don Mitchell Jr. is murdered by the Riddler, a masked killer. Reclusive billionaire Bruce Wayne, who has operated for two years as the vigilante Batman, investigates the murder alongside the Gotham City Police Department (GCPD).

title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
desc: In Ghostbusters: Afterlife, when a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind. The film is written by Gil Kenan & Jason Reitman.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
desc: Featuring vivid descriptions and an imaginative story line, it followed the adventures of the unlikely hero Harry Potter, a lonely orphan who discovers that he is actually a wizard and enrolls in the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The book received numerous awards, including the British Book Award.

title: Dolittle
desc: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets. A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

title: Mortal Kombat
desc: The film follows Cole Young, a washed-up mixed martial arts fighter who is unaware of his hidden lineage or why the assassin Sub-Zero is hunting him down. Concerned for the safety of his family, he seeks out a clique of fighters that were chosen to defend Earthrealm against Outworld.

title: Dead Pool
desc: When former mercenary Wade Wilson learns he has terminal cancer, he undergoes a daring experiment in the ruthless Ajax's laboratory. He is to be transformed into a super soldier. The experiment endows him with enormous self-healing powers, but disfigures him. So he slips into a red and black suit with a mask, calls himself Deadpool from now on and starts a revenge campaign against Ajax. By the way, he also wants to save his girlfriend Vanessa.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
desc: Banker Andy Dufresne is innocently convicted of murder in 1947. He is sent to the dreaded Shawshank Prison, where he befriends Ellis Boyd Red Redding, who has been incarcerated for a long time. Andy's banking skills are slowly making him indispensable to the guards and the warden. But he suffers greatly from the corrupt warden Norton, who leads a brutal regime. Andy knows his only chance of survival is to escape.

title: The invisible Guest
desc: The life of the successful businessman Adrián Doria suddenly turns into a nightmare: he wakes up in a hotel room locked from the inside next to the corpse of his lover. He protests his innocence, but the evidence seems clear and his wife also assumes Adrián's guilt and leaves him. But then top attorney Virginia Goodman becomes aware of the case and encounters new witnesses. This is how a nerve-wracking cat-and-mouse game begins.

title: A Christmas Carol
desc: Scrooge is a miserly old man who hates Christmas more than anything because that's not when his employees work. One Christmas Eve he receives a surprise visit from his deceased business partner Marley, who was cold-hearted and stingy when he was alive, but now regrets it. He came to warn his former friend. If he doesn't change fundamentally, a sad end awaits him. He receives support from the spirits of Christmas.

title: Avatar
desc: Paralyzed ex-Marine Jake Sully takes part in a scientific experiment on the alien planet Pandora. With the help of a so-called avatar, a hybrid that is mentally controlled and gives him a new kind of mobility, he explores the planet. Along the way, he meets the beautiful Na'vi woman Neytiri. Through her, he learns about the life and culture of the native people of Pandora and is drawn into the battle that will decide the fate of the planet and its inhabitants.

title: In Time
desc: In the world of the future, lifetime is the new currency. The simple worker Will Salas gets all his time transferred from a super-rich man. The boss of the corrupt police department does not like this transaction. As Will begins to generously give away his time to those in need, jeopardizing the entire economic system of the future. A bitter race against time begins and the glowing countdown on Will's forearm begins.

title: Tenet
desc: A CIA agent is recruited to carry out a special mission. He is to prevent the third world war. He must stop a person who has the ability to manipulate time. He learns from a scientist that in the future people will be able to reverse the entropy of objects so that these objects invert temporally. In this way, bullets fired from firearms will not be shot down, but will be absorbed. More and more such objects are found.

title: Inception
desc: Thanks to the latest technology, it will be possible in the near future to enter people's dreams and thus their subconscious. This means that it will also be possible to steal other people's ideas, ideas that were previously their own. A master thief in the latest field of corporate espionage is Dom Cobb, which makes him a particularly sought-after man not only in a positive sense. To finally be able to lead a normal life again, he just has to do the one last job.

title: I Am Legend
desc: A virus turns people into bloodthirsty vampires. Only a small part of the population, including former military scientist Robert Neville, is immune to the genetically modified virus. As the only remaining human in Manhattan, he tries to find an antidote with the help of his own blood. But the last man on Earth is not alone: light-shy mutants are watching him and waiting until one day he makes a mistake.

title: Smile
desc: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, Dr. Rose Cotter starts experiencing frightening occurrences that she can't explain. Rose must confront her troubling past in order to survive and escape her horrifying new reality.

title: Prey
desc: Set in the Comanche Nation 300 years ago, Prey is the story of a young woman, Naru, a fierce and highly skilled warrior. She has been raised in the shadow of some of the most legendary hunters who roam the Great Plains, so when danger threatens her camp, she sets out to protect her people.
